Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout

[Groovy] Class Layout2Fo

      • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout.Layout2Fo

      • Transforms a xml representation into XSL-FO file and offers a possibility to render the FO object.

        Authors:
        cmahnke

        • Field Summary

            Fields 
            Modifiers Name Description
            protected static URL  config The URL of the FP configuration to used
            protected org.apache.fop.apps.FopFactory  fopFactory The org.apache.fop.apps.FopFactory to be used
            protected Document  inDoc The input Document
            protected URL  includePath the path to serch for external media like images
            protected static URL  stylesheet The URL of the stylesheet to used
            protected Boolean  useConfig Sets if an external FOP configuration should be used (use this also if you want to embed fonts in the result)
          • Inherited fields 
            Fields inherited from class Fields
            class AbstractTransformer resolver, result

        • Constructor Detail

          • protected Layout2Fo()

            Construts a empty Layout2Fo and sets the parameters of the transformation.

          • Layout2Fo(Document input, URL stylesheet)

            Construts a Layout2Fo, sets and the parameters of the transformation and sets the given input.

            Parameters:
            input - the Document of the document to be transformed
            stylesheet - the URL to be used for the transformation
            See Also:
            Layout2Fo()

          • Layout2Fo(URL input, URL stylesheet)

            Construts a Layout2Fo, sets and the parameters of the transformation and sets the given input.

            Parameters:
            input - the URL of the document to be transformed
            stylesheet - the URL to be used for the transformation
            See Also:
            Layout2Fo()

        • Method Detail

          • void format(OutputStream out)

            Formats the FOP result as PDF

            Parameters:
            the - OutputStream to write the result to see #format(OutputStream, String)

          • void format(OutputStream out, String mimeType)

            Formats the FOP result as the requested mime type

            throws:
            IllegalArgumentException if no result is present
            Parameters:
            the - OutputStream to write the result to
            the - requested Mime type of the result, use org.apache.fop.apps.MimeConstants

          • void setDebugParam(Boolean debug)

            XSLT Parameters are Strings, convert them, maybe these method should be generated as well

            Parameters:
            should - stylesheet debug mode be enabled

          • @Override void transform()

            Checks if the required parameters are set and performes the transformation

            throws:
            IllegalStateException if the paramters are empty or not set
            See Also:
            AbstractTransformer.transform
